text: Arau tomalokara majata yisakale strai thai mrtyubarana karae, sihamte yena sihamtara straisakalaka gharara paraa uliya'i nidiye arau yena sihamtara babe sampurna ebacharara bharana-posanara achiyata karae. Kintu yadi sihamta (nija icchate) ola'i yaya, tente bidhi mutabika sihamte nijara babe yi karaiba tata tomalokara kono papa nahaya; arau allaha prabala paraakramasali, prajnamaya
